net.breezeware.dynamo.auth.identity.service.api

Interface IdentityService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    IdentityServiceDbImpl

    public interface IdentityService
    Interface to manage aspects like roles,groups,accounts and users.
    Author:
    gowtham

        UserRegistrationToken createUserRegistrationToken(User user)
        Creates and persists a user registration token for a User.
        Parameters:
        user - User for whom the token is created.
        Returns:

      • getUserRegistrationToken

        Retrieves a user registration token for a single user by its token value string.
        Parameters:
        token - Token string assigned to the user registration
        Returns:
        Token if found, else null.
